class trplearn.trpalg.Manipulation(data)[ソース]#

ベースクラス: object

Basic common manipulation for TropicalAlgebra classes.

property T#

Getting the transposed array.

property ndim#

Number of array dimensions.

to_list()[ソース]#

Convert to the python native list.

to_numpy()[ソース]#

Convert to the numpy array.

class trplearn.trpalg.MaxPlus(data)[ソース]#

ベースクラス: TropicalAlgebra, Manipulation

Max-plus二重半環。

Max-plus double semiring is the following algebraic system: \((\double{R}\cup{\pm\infty},-\infty,0,\max,+, +\infty,0,\min,+,-a)\), where set, zero, unit, add, mult, dualzero, dualunit, dualadd, dualmult, conjugate, from left to right.

パラメータ:

data (array-like) -- An array.

property C#

Getting the conjugation array.

戻り値:

The conjugate of the current MaxPlus object.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

property H#

Getting the Hermitian array.

戻り値:

The Hermitian of the current MaxPlus object.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

add(other)[ソース]#

Max-plus addition defined by \(a\oplus b=\max(a,b)\).

パラメータ:

other (int, float, MaxPlus) -- Addition.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus addition by other.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

サンプル

>>> a = MaxPlus(3)
>>> b = MaxPlus(5)
>>> a.add(b)
MaxPlus(5)

>>> c = MaxPlus([1, 5, 3])
>>> d = MaxPlus([4, 2, 6])
>>> c.add(d)
MaxPlus([4 5 6])

>>> A = MaxPlus([[1, 3], [5, 7]])
>>> B = MaxPlus([[2, 6], [4, 8]])
>>> A.add(B)
MaxPlus([[2 6]
         [5 8]])
dot(other)[ソース]#

Max-plus matrix multiplication.

パラメータ:

other (MaxPlus) -- The matrix to multiply with.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus matrix multiplication.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

dualadd(other)[ソース]#

Max-plus dual-addition defined by \(a\ominus b=\min(a,b)\).

パラメータ:

other (int, float, MaxPlus) -- Dual-addition.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus dual-addition by other.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

dualdot(other)[ソース]#

Max-plus dual matrix multiplication.

パラメータ:

other (MaxPlus) -- The matrix to multiply with.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus dual matrix multiplication.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

dualmult(other)[ソース]#

Max-plus dual-multiplication (same as multiplication).

パラメータ:

other (int, float, MaxPlus) -- Dual-multiplication.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus dual-multiplication by other.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

dualpow(n)[ソース]#

Max-plus dual matrix power.

パラメータ:

n (int) -- The power to raise the matrix to.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus dual matrix power.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

例外:

ValueError -- If n is negative.

mult(other)[ソース]#

Max-plus multiplication defined by \(a\otimes b=a+b\).

パラメータ:

other (int, float, MaxPlus) -- Multiplication.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus multiplication by other.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

pow(n)[ソース]#

Max-plus matrix power.

パラメータ:

n (int) -- The power to raise the matrix to.

戻り値:

Result of max-plus matrix power.

戻り値の型:

MaxPlus

例外:

ValueError -- If n is negative.

class trplearn.trpalg.MinPlus(data)[ソース]#

ベースクラス: TropicalAlgebra, Manipulation

Min-plus二重半環。

Min-plus double semiring is the following algebraic system: \((\double{R}\cup{\pm\infty},+\infty,0,\min,+, -\infty,0,\max,+,-a)\), where set, zero, unit, add, mult, dualzero, dualunit, dualadd, dualmult, conjugate, from left to right.

パラメータ:

data (array-like) -- An array.

property C#

Getting the conjugation array.

戻り値:

The conjugate of the current MinPlus object.

戻り値の型:

MinPlus

property H#

Getting the Hermitian array.

戻り値:

The Hermitian of the current MinPlus object.

戻り値の型:

MinPlus

add(other)[ソース]#

Min-plus addition defined by \(a\oplus b=\min(a,b)\).

パラメータ:

other (int, float, MinPlus) -- Addition.

戻り値:

Result of min-plus addition by other.

戻り値の型:

MinPlus

サンプル

>>> a = MinPlus(3)
>>> b = MinPlus(5)
>>> a.add(b)
MinPlus(3)

>>> c = MinPlus([1, 5, 3])
>>> d = MinPlus([4, 2, 6])
>>> c.add(d)
MinPlus([1 2 3])

>>> A = MinPlus([[1, 3], [5, 7]])
>>> B = MinPlus([[2, 6], [4, 8]])
>>> A.add(B)
MinPlus([[1 3]
         [4 7]])
